items.name: Etherscan
items.description: Etherscan is a Block Explorer and Analytics Platform for Ethereum, a decentralized smart contracts platform.

items.name: Convex
items.description: Convex is a platform that boosts rewards for CRV stakers and liquidity providers alike, all in a simple and easy to use interface.

items.name: Curve
items.description: Curve is DeFi's leading AMM, (Automated Market Maker). Hundreds of liquidity pools have been launched through Curve's factory and incentivized by Curve's DAO.

items.name: IQ.wiki
items.description: IQ.wiki is the world's largest blockchain and crypto encyclopedia.
